title: Tequila Cosmopolitan
directions: Run a lime wedge around the rim of a Martini glass. Dip the rim in sugar. Combine tequila with cranberry juice concentrate, water, and lime juice in a cocktail shaker. Fill with ice. Shake vigorously until icy cold, then strain into glass.
ingredients: 2 1/2 tablespoons thawed frozen cranberry juice concentrate
